summary: Ebonhollow Manor is a house found on the outskirts of Raven Rock. I have made this house to be used as an alternative (or addition) to Severin Manor. The house can be accessed after completing the \"Final Descent\" quest for Crescius Caerellius and solving the mistery behind his great-grandfather\'s disappearance.
descriptionHtml:
[color=green]Ebonhollow Manor is a medium size player home, which can be accessed after completing the \"Final Descent\" quest, given to you by Crescius Caerellius in the Raven Rock Mines. The house is located on the outskirts of Raven Rock and can be used either as an alternative or addition to Severin Manor.[/color]

[color=yellow][b]GOOD TO KNOW, BUGS AND REQUIREMENTS:[/b]
[list][*]This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC to function
[*]The key to the home can be found in Gratian Caerellius\' satchel, near his remains in the Raven Rock Mine. If you have already completed the quest and don\'t want to go back just for the key, type \'help \"Ebonhollow Manor Key\"\' into the console, and then \'player.additem [whichever ID shows] 1\'
[*]The Barrel of Emberbrand wine needed for Captain Veleth\'s quest will sometimes not show outside the house. If this happens, you will have to use the \"tcl\" console command, and search for the barrel \"inside\" the exterior of the house.[/list][/color]

[color=green][b]FEATURES:[/b]
Rooms:
[list][*]A large living and dining area
[*]A storage and alchemy area
[*]A library
[*]A Bedroom
Amenities:
[*]Bookshelves that can accomodate up to 270 books
[*]An alchemy laboratory
[*]Two mannequins
[*]Three dagger display cases
[*]Two storage chests
[*]One storage knapsack
[*]A fireplace and cooking set
[*]Upper floor heating (via a vent in the fireplace for all you Frostfall users)
Other:
[*]Ebonhollow blade (an ebony sword that comes with the house)
[*]Idle markers, so your followers will have something to do while visiting your home[/list][/color]
author: Rajti15
